titleNullable: COVID-19: Forecast trends for the many countries
subtitleNullable: Comprehensive and comparative analysis of forecasts
descriptionNullable: ### Context This dataset has CSV-files from notebooks of the dataset [COVID-19: Holidays of countries](https://www.kaggle.com/vbmokin/covid19-holidays-of-countries) with forecast trends for the many countries for example: * notebook [COVID-19 in 70 countries: daily Prophet forecast](https://www.kaggle.com/vbmokin/covid-19-in-70-countries-daily-prophet-forecast) ### Content Data has results of the FB Prophet prediction - typical columns. ### Acknowledgements Thanks to the authors of the [notebooks of the dataset COVID-19: Holidays of countries](https://www.kaggle.com/vbmokin/covid19-holidays-of-countries/notebooks) Thanks for the image to iXimus from Pixabay. ### Inspiration Tasks: 1. What are the general trends? 2. What is similar between countries? What clusters can be distinguished among countries? 3. Which countries are abnormally different?
title: COVID-19: Forecast trends for the many countries
subtitle: Comprehensive and comparative analysis of forecasts
description: ### Context This dataset has CSV-files from notebooks of the dataset [COVID-19: Holidays of countries](https://www.kaggle.com/vbmokin/covid19-holidays-of-countries) with forecast trends for the many countries for example: * notebook [COVID-19 in 70 countries: daily Prophet forecast](https://www.kaggle.com/vbmokin/covid-19-in-70-countries-daily-prophet-forecast) ### Content Data has results of the FB Prophet prediction - typical columns. ### Acknowledgements Thanks to the authors of the [notebooks of the dataset COVID-19: Holidays of countries](https://www.kaggle.com/vbmokin/covid19-holidays-of-countries/notebooks) Thanks for the image to iXimus from Pixabay. ### Inspiration Tasks: 1.
